--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/25/04 10:09:38 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> bustercross365@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > More evil laughter escaped Megatron Revived's voice processors.  
She is 
> > definatly Leader material.
> > "If you are trying to get to an important point, please do so 
now.  If I am 
> > supposed to remember you, you'll have to schedule a time for us 
to, sit down 
> > and chat.  But right now I fear my family is in dire straits.  
To the point-"
> > The massive and powerful transformer showed a little of his 
speed when he 
> > closed the gap between them in a mere two seconds.
> > "Tell me were the bounty hunters Malice and Organics are." he 
said simply, 
> > no longer enjoying this very entertaining conversation.
> > 
> 
> Unwavering, locking those crimson optics upon his. "I'm afraid I 
cannot help 
> you there. I have no knowledge of whom you seek," spoken calmly.
